## ams.amc config trust add

Add a trusted client

### Synopsis

Add a trusted client.

Trust a new client to communicate with AMS by providing its certificate.


```
ams.amc config trust add <certificate_path> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
$ amc config trust add client.crt
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for add
```
